name: Blackout (itch) (Spilled Tea Productions, Jesse Richard, Prashat Gajre, Dakshvir Singh Rehill)
name_original: Blackout (itch) (Spilled Tea Productions, Jesse Richard, Prashat Gajre, Dakshvir Singh Rehill)
description: You have woken in a dream that has been plagued by your own vices. You must make yourself a path through your nightmare and navigate your mind going towards happiness and health without being drawn back in by the darkness. Drag and connect items to create a path, only connecting objects to the one you're currently on. Collect the light and use it to destroy monsters and stop them from tempting you back into the void The path to recovery isn’t a quick fix, it is a long journey to being whole again.
